newsitem.title: BULGARIA: Bulgaria lev closes firmer, still off midday highs.
newsitem.headline: Bulgaria lev closes firmer, still off midday highs.

text.p: The Bulgarian lev closed at 1,650-1,700 per dollar, up from opening at 1,710-1,730 but down from midday's 1,600-1,650 on a rise in dollar demand, dealers said.
"Final (dollar) buyers came to the market in early afternoon bidding for limited volumes and pushing the lev down by some 50 from midday highs," one dealer said.
Trade was range-bound between 1,650-1,700 levs per dollar in the afternoon because there was little interest for dollar purchases above 1,700 levs and reluctance for sales below 1,650, traders said.
-- Anastas Petrov, Sofia Newsroom, (++359-2) 981 8569 (c) Reuters Limited 1997
